QuestData.Title: The Escape
QuestData.Description: Take this invisibility liquor to young Maybell. It should last long enough for her to visit Tommy Joe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Invisibility Liquor to Maybell Maclure.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you deliver my letter to Tommy Joe? What did he say??
QuestData.RewardText: Oh...my! I feel guilty deceiving my family, but my feelings for Tommy Joe are too strong to ignore.$B$BThank you, $n. I'll drink this liquor as soon as I have the chance and sneak away to my love.$B$BAnd for you... please take this.
